nodes.name: claim

nodes.documentation: Accumulate the amount FIN mined by depositing between _lastBlock and _currentBlock
nodes.name: calculateDepositFIN

nodes.documentation: Accumulate the amount FIN mined by borrowing between _lastBlock and _currentBlock
nodes.name: calculateBorrowFIN

claim(address).details: If the FIN mining index point doesn't exist, we have to calculate the FIN amount  accurately. So the user can withdraw all available FIN tokens.

getBorrowBalanceCurrent(address,address).details: This is an estimation. Add a new checkpoint first, if you want to derive the exact balance.

getDepositETH(address).details: This is an estimation. Add a new checkpoint first, if you want to derive the exact balance.

getDepositInterest(address,address).details: The deposit interest may not have been updated in AccountTokenLib, so we need to explicited calcuate it.

isAccountLiquidatable(address).return: true if the account is liquidatable

isUserHasAnyDeposits(address).return: true if the user has positive deposit balance

isUserHasBorrows(address,uint8).return: true if the user has borrowed the token

isUserHasDeposits(address,uint8).return: true if the user has positive deposit balance for the token

claim(address).notice: An account claim all mined FIN token.

getBorrowBalanceCurrent(address,address).notice: Get current borrow balance of a token

getBorrowETH(address).notice: Get borrowed balance of a token in the uint of Wei

getBorrowPower(address).notice: Calculate an account's borrow power based on token's LTV

getDepositETH(address).notice: Get current deposit balance of a token

getDepositInterest(address,address).notice: Get deposit interest of an account for a specific token

isAccountLiquidatable(address).notice: Check if the account is liquidatable

isUserHasAnyDeposits(address).notice: Check if the user has deposit for any tokens

isUserHasBorrows(address,uint8).notice: Check if the user has borrowed a token

isUserHasDeposits(address,uint8).notice: Check if the user has deposit for a token

withdraw(address,address,uint256).notice: Update token info for withdraw. The interest will be withdrawn with higher priority.
